scripts.nodeVersionMessage: echo [33m make sure you are running node lts version [0m
scripts.build: npx rimraf build && npx rimraf node && mkdir node && copyfiles -u 1 "./src/**/*" ./node && webpack && npx rimraf build/src && npx rimraf node
scripts.package:lib: npm run build && copyfiles ./package.json build && cd build && npm version "5.0.0" && npm pack
scripts.publish:lib: npm run build && cd build && npm publish
scripts.lint:fix: npx prettier --loglevel silent --write "src/**/*.{ts,tsx,js,jsx,html,css,sass,less,json,yml,md,graphql}" && npx prettier --loglevel silent --write "sasjs-tests/src/**/*.{ts,tsx,js,jsx,html,css,sass,less,json,yml,md,graphql}" && npx prettier --loglevel silent --write "cypress/**/*.{ts,tsx,js,jsx,html,css,sass,less,json,yml,md,graphql}"
scripts.lint: npx prettier --check "src/**/*.{ts,tsx,js,jsx,html,css,sass,less,json,yml,md,graphql}" && npx prettier --check "sasjs-tests/src/**/*.{ts,tsx,js,jsx,html,css,sass,less,json,yml,md,graphql}" && npx prettier --check "cypress/**/*.{ts,tsx,js,jsx,html,css,sass,less,json,yml,md,graphql}"
scripts.lint:silent: npx prettier --loglevel silent --check "src/**/*.{ts,tsx,js,jsx,html,css,sass,less,json,yml,md,graphql}" && npx prettier --loglevel silent --check "sasjs-tests/src/**/*.{ts,tsx,js,jsx,html,css,sass,less,json,yml,md,graphql}" && npx prettier --loglevel silent --check "cypress/**/*.{ts,tsx,js,jsx,html,css,sass,less,json,yml,md,graphql}"
scripts.prepare: git rev-parse --git-dir && git config core.hooksPath ./.git-hooks && git config core.autocrlf false || true
